creditline: Gift of Charles H. Bell, J. Ford Bell, and Samuel H. Bell
description: salver, one of a pair, coat of arms in center, Tatton, Thomas William Tatton, High Sherriff of Co. Chester; Motto (They Increase)
inscription:
Marks; Inscription

On an applied circular plate on the reverse of .2 is the inscription:
   [Present to JAMES FORD BELL by HIS ASSOCIATES IN GENERAL MILLS INCORPORATED on January 29th 1948 To Express their Gratitude and Appreciation for His Founding of General Mills Inc. 1928 His Development of our Younger Men His Wish Management of our Affairs and His Inspiring Leadership through Research in New and Expanding Fields of Endeavor as President 1928-1934 as Chairman 1934-1947].
markings:
Marks

Each fully marked on underside.
title: Salver, one of a pair
